column4: sam_delete the new partition and follow number 13 on this guide: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1195275
boot into the ubuntu live cd, go to system > administration> gparted
find the partitiona and choose delete.  make sure it's the new installation though, you don't want to accidently delete your old one.
will that not put him back were he was with no working operating system?
